医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
克利夫兰诊所公布三阴性乳腺癌疫苗的新发现克利夫兰诊所的研究人员展示了他们的新疫苗研究的最新结果，该疫苗旨在预防三阴性乳腺癌，这是一种最具侵袭性和致命性的疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Cleveland-Clinic-presents-new-findings-on-triple-阴性-breast-cancer-vaccine.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Cleveland-Clinic-presents-new-findings-on-triple-阴性-breast-cancer-vaccine.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8d524dbf-3384-415c-a463-c64aede119dd Fri, 08 Nov 2024 22:46:54 -0500 Cleveland Clinic presents new findings on triple-negative breast cancer vaccine
HMGB1 作为肝病发病机制的关键介质由于高发病率和死亡率，急性和慢性肝病继续构成重大的临床挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/HMGB1-as-a-key-mediator-in-liver-disease-pathogenesis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/HMGB1-as-a-key-mediator-in-liver-disease-pathogenesis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7d07ff36-2c35-41e1-bdcb-a5a8c47cdc89 Fri, 08 Nov 2024 22:35:30 -0500 HMGB1 as a key mediator in liver disease pathogenesis
研究表明 COVID-19 期间的公众批评如何影响教师的福祉研究显示，在 COVID-19 封锁期间，公众对教师“重返校园”施加了巨大的压力，这加深了一种已经普遍存在的教师被低估的感觉，并让一些教师积极重新思考自己的职业生涯。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Research-shows-how-public-criticism-during-COVID-19-impacted-teacher-wellbeing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Research-shows-how-public-criticism-during-COVID-19-impacted-teacher-wellbeing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2a77ddbd-42fb-4ddf-914b-58d569072054 Fri, 08 Nov 2024 22:08:11 -0500 Research shows how public criticism during COVID-19 impacted teacher wellbeing
新方法重振疲惫的 T 细胞以改善肿瘤控制随着癌细胞的生长，它们会将乳酸等代谢副产物泵入肿瘤微环境中。耗尽的 T 细胞 -;已经失去了抗癌功效——；根据匹兹堡大学和 UPMC 希尔曼癌症中心的最新研究，人体会消耗这种乳酸，从而进一步消耗能量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/New-approach-reinvigorates-exhausted-T-cells-to-improve-tumor-control.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/New-approach-reinvigorates-exhausted-T-cells-to-improve-tumor-control.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4d4b7302-514d-42f5-b5a7-d88bf7171c65 Fri, 08 Nov 2024 22:05:47 -0500 New approach reinvigorates exhausted T cells to improve tumor control
狼疮研究联盟推出首个转化桥梁奖以加速狼疮治疗狼疮研究联盟 (LRA) 很高兴地宣布首届转化桥梁奖 (TBA) 获得者，该奖项于今年设立，旨在加速将突破性研究转化为狼疮的潜在治疗和诊断方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Lupus-Research-Alliance-launches-first-Translational-Bridge-Award-to-accelerate-lupus-treatments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Lupus-Research-Alliance-launches-first-Translational-Bridge-Award-to-accelerate-lupus-treatments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=db4ecbd5-c8d4-42b3-8349-5fb344eac760 Fri, 08 Nov 2024 22:04:03 -0500 Lupus Research Alliance launches first Translational Bridge Award to accelerate lupus treatments
基因诊断解开30名未确诊患者的医学谜团一个国际研究小组为 30 名患者提供了基因诊断，尽管进行了广泛的临床或基因检测，这些人的病情多年来仍未得到诊断。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Genetic-diagnosis-solves-medical-mystery-for-30-undiagnosed-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Genetic-diagnosis-solves-medical-mystery-for-30-undiagnosed-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d7929560-4d19-4dd6-af57-ebafa5c32f72 Fri, 08 Nov 2024 22:02:09 -0500 Genetic diagnosis solves medical mystery for 30 undiagnosed patients
揭示 ALS 神经变性背后的途径美国每年约有 5,000 人患有肌萎缩侧索硬化症 (ALS)。根据美国疾病控制与预防中心的数据，他们在被诊断后平均只能存活两到五年。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Uncovering-the-pathway-behind-ALS-neurodegenesis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Uncovering-the-pathway-behind-ALS-neurodegenesis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b5c178b5-2c80-4d74-90b9-a196e207aeeb Fri, 08 Nov 2024 21:52:15 -0500 Uncovering the pathway behind ALS neurodegeneration
探讨HSD17B13对肝脂肪变性的保护作用慢性肝病（CLD）是一个日益严重的全球健康挑战，每年导致数百万人死亡。其主要诱因包括代谢功能障碍相关的脂肪性肝炎（MASH）、酒精性肝病（ALD）和丙型肝炎病毒感染。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Exploring-the-protective-effects-of-HSD17B13-in-hepatic-steatosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Exploring-the-protective-effects-of-HSD17B13-in-hepatic-steatosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0c924215-7d7d-422e-a25c-573cf0ca3f41 Fri, 08 Nov 2024 21:47:13 -0500 Exploring the protective effects of HSD17B13 in hepatic steatosis
结直肠癌诊断中的传统和前沿内窥镜模式自 20 世纪初诞生以来，胃肠道 (GI) 内窥镜检查的发展已经改变了结直肠癌的诊断方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Traditional-and-cutting-edge-endooscopy-modalities-in-colorectal-cancer-diagnosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Traditional-and-cutting-edge-endooscopy-modalities-in-colorectal-cancer-diagnosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a6c339f7-d341-43c6-b83b-cf0ea01b6690 Fri, 08 Nov 2024 21:40:48 -0500 Traditional and cutting-edge endoscopic modalities in colorectal cancer diagnosis
探索急性卒中试验中传统知情同意替代方案的当前使用和未来辛辛那提大学的医学博士亚斯明·阿齐兹 (Yasmin Aziz) 和医学博士约瑟夫·布罗德里克 (Joseph Broderick) 于 11 月 7 日在《神经学》杂志上合着了一篇社论，分析了急性中风试验中传统知情同意替代方案的当前使用情况和潜在未来。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Exploring-the-current-use-and-future-of-alternatives-to-traditional-informed-consent-in-acute-中风-试验.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Exploring-the-current-use-and-future-of-alternatives-to-traditional-informed-consent-in-acute-中风-试验.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9c65fb38-0a22-4a6e-8091-4a7a3160a388 Fri, 08 Nov 2024 21:36:32 -0500 Exploring the current use and future of alternatives to traditional informed consent in acute stroke trials
